Description: Military invasions of sovereign states, including of colonies, excluding civil wars and invasions of/by rebel groups, breakaway states, or provisional governments

How was the period selected: Post-WWII when global coverage and recording became more reliable

Category name: List of heads of state and government who died in office
Description: Deaths of heads of state while in office, from all causes
How was the period selected: Post-war period when the modern world order largely took form

Description: List of approved NDAs and BLAs for new molecular entities with the US FDA since 1998
How was the period selected: Website: 'Drugs@FDA includes most of the drug products approved since 1939. The majority of patient information, labels, approval letters, reviews, and other information are available for drug products approved since 1998.'

Category name: List of FDA Approved Psych Drugs
Description: List of approved NDAs and BLAs for new molecular entities with the US FDA since 1998 - limited to psychotropic drugs using their suffix or USP classification
How was the period selected: Website: 'Drugs@FDA includes most of the drug products approved since 1939. The majority of patient information, labels, approval letters, reviews, and other information are available for drug products approved since 1998.'

Description: List of approved BLAs for vaccines with the FDA, including licenses since voluntarily revoked
How was the period selected: Earliest data available in purple book data pull

Description: Floods since 1960 that have killed at least 100 people
Description quantity column 1: Number of deaths (midpoint if a range is given)
How was the period selected: Estimated approximate start of reliable worldwide reporting

Category name: List of deadly foodborne or waterborne or enteric disease outbreaks
Description: CDC National Outbreak Reporting System reports of foodborne and waterborne disease outbreaks and enteric (intestinal) disease outbreaks spread by contact with environmental sources, infected people or animals, and other means.
How was the period selected: Recording for foodborne illnesses started in 1998, most recent data as of 2/21/2023 is through 2020

Description: Number of UN member states by year, proxy for number of countries by year
How was the period selected: From 1964 onward, country formation and UN membership are consistently within a year of each other, usually the same year
Availability of high-quality data via OWID
